abstract: Goldman Sachs has a $5 billion I.O.U. to Warren Buffett on its books, which the billionaire investor sunk into the bank back in the depths of the financial crisis, now it’s mulling paying it back, The Wall Street Journal reports.
snippet: Goldman Sachs has a $5 billion I.O.U. to Warren Buffett on its books, which the billionaire investor sunk into the bank back in the depths of the financial crisis, now it’s mulling paying it back, The Wall Street Journal reports.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs, which has a $5 billion I.O.U. to Warren E. Buffett on its books, is now considering paying back the billionaire investor, The Wall Street Journal reports.

headline.main: Goldman to Pay Back Buffett’s $5 Billion?
